Record.ClassificationPath: Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Molecular Mechanisms of Pharmacological Action/Enzyme Inhibitors/Proton Pump Inhibitors
Record.Description: Compounds that inhibit H(+)-K(+)-EXCHANGING ATPASE. They are used as ANTI-ULCER AGENTS and sometimes in place of HISTAMINE H2 ANTAGONISTS for GASTROESOPHAGEAL REFLUX.
